item.title: 2026 NFL Coaching/GM Tracker: Falcons First Team to Interview John Harbaugh
item.description: The coaching carousel for the 2026 offseason is about to get moving. Here are the latest news and rumors from around the NFL!

item.title: NASCAR Returns to Chase Format with Single 10-Race Championship Round
item.description: NASCAR will return in 2026 to its original "Chase" format, a 10-race postseason that will feature 16 drivers vying for the title.

item.title: Kylian Mbappé Criticized For Real Madrid's Guard of Honor Snub in Barcelona Win
item.description: Barcelona's president criticized Kylian Mbappé following the Real Madrid star's refusal to engage in a guard of honor.

item.title: NFL, CFB Weekend Betting Recap: 'Texans-Steelers Will Decide Wild Card Weekend'
item.description: Books and bettors had a give-and-take Wild Card Weekend. The ultimate winner? It will be determined Monday night. Patrick Everson reports.

item.title: Xabi Alonso Leaves Real Madrid after Loss to Barcelona; Club Names Replacement
item.description: Real Madrid announced the departure of manager Xabi Alonso following their Spanish Super Cup final loss to rivals Barcelona.
